data.title: The Night of the Triffids {Signed Limited Edition}
data.meta_description: The Night of the Triffids {Signed Limited Edition} by Clark, Simon (Author) - ISBN 10: 1587672723 - ISBN 13: 9781587672729 - Cemetery Dance Publications - 2015 - Hardcover
data.text:
Clark, Simon

Hardcover. Condition: As New. Dust Jacket Condition: As New. Clark, Alan M. (Illustrator) (illustrator). 1st Edition, Limited Edition. As New in an As New dust jacket. Bound in full blue cloth. Both the spine and the decorative front panel are stamped in silver. Red endpapers. 405pps. First Printing. An excellent, collector's quality copy: clean, tight, square and bright. All tips are sharp. The textblock is immaculate; no reading wear and no previous ownership markings. The dust jacket, glossy in an archival sleeve, is also As New. One of 1,000 unnunmbered copies SIGNED by the author on a preliminary page. Purchase with confidence: all books, gradings, and descriptions are rendered the care of a genuine bibliophile. Satisfaction guaranteed or all costs you've incurred will be promptly refunded. Thanks for your interest in Nooks Of Books. To assist with your decision, photos can be emailed upon request. 41-D. Signed by Author(s). Seller Inventory # 422-6021
